title: Boutique Beachfront Bondi Escape
description: Immerse yourself in the Bondi lifestyle at Hôtel Ravesis - a boutique retreat at the heart of Sydney’s world-famous beach suburb and the only Bondi hotel with uninterrupted ocean views. Spend leisurely days soaking up the sea breeze with a signature cocktail at the upstairs terrace bar or watching the waves crash into the champagne shore while you enjoy freshly shucked oysters at the onsite restaurant. Featuring 12 individually styled rooms and a plush late-night club space, this icon of coastal hospitality is the perfect place to stay and play in Bondi.

title: Sun-Kissed Bondi Self-Contained Stay near the Beach
description: Experience sun-kissed bliss with a self-contained stay at the stylish Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney, superbly located within easy walking distance of the famed sandy stretch. This unique 'aparthotel' is teeming with classic yet contemporary features sure to impress, and each studio boasts its own balcony and kitchenette, and apartments a fully-equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Unique design elements including contemporary furnishings such as detailed cornices and marble finishes are complemented by modern technology. Across the property, discover tasteful facilities including a gymnasium, outdoor swimming pool and convenient onsite parking.
